QuestData.Title: The Magical Kingdom of Dalaran
QuestData.Description: The Kirin Tor have moved their city here to Northrend.$B$BNo longer does Dalaran sit under its protective dome on the shores of Lordamere Lake. Now the city magically floats above the Crystalsong Forest.$B$BThey believe you to be ready for your journey to the city. Look for the teleportation crystal in Crystal Song Forest.$B$BWhen you arrive, seek out Archmage Celindra.
QuestData.LogDescription: Report to Archmage Celindra at The Violet Gate in Dalaran.
